holdings.author: Emily Short
holdings.title: Complex Listing
holdings.summary: Complex Listing provides more sophisticated listing options: the ability to impose special ordering instructions on a list, and also the ability to change the delimiters of the list to produce different styles and effects.

holdings.author: Emily Short
holdings.title: Inanimate Listeners
holdings.summary: Allows the player to address inanimate objects such as a talking computer, microphone, or telephone in a form such as ASK COMPUTER ABOUT COORDINATES.

holdings.author: Emily Short
holdings.title: Locksmith
holdings.summary: Implicit handling of doors and containers so that lock manipulation is automatic if the player has the necessary keys.

holdings.author: Emily Short
holdings.title: Skeleton Keys
holdings.summary: Allows for locks which can be opened by more than one key.

holdings.author: Emily Short
holdings.title: Punctuation Removal
holdings.summary: Offers specialized commands to strip troublesome punctuation such as periods, commas, question marks, and quote marks out of the player's typed commands; provides a converter to especially interpret titles that contain full stops, such as "Mrs." or "Dr.".

holdings.author: Eric Eve
holdings.title: Epistemology
holdings.summary: Keeping track of what the player character knows and sees.

holdings.author: Graham Nelson
holdings.title: Metric Units
holdings.summary: Scientific kinds of value for simulations, using real number arithmetic. Uses SI units for mass, elapsed time, electric current, temperature, luminosity, frequency, force, energy, pressure, power, electric charge, voltage, luminance, area, volume, velocity, acceleration, momentum, density, heat capacity.

holdings.author: Graham Nelson
holdings.title: Approximate Metric Units
holdings.summary: Scientific kinds of value for simulations, using scaled integer arithmetic: really only useful for Z-machine projects.

holdings.author: Graham Nelson
holdings.title: Rideable Vehicles
holdings.summary: Vehicles which one sits on top of, rather than inside, such as elephants or motorcycles.
